name: The Dumb Sidekick
description:
Do you like a Cursed Robot as your sleep paralysis demon then this is the game for you, shoot enemies, blow out your eardrums, turn yourself into a *babysitter*.

This is a game made for the WOWIE GAME JAM 4.0. submitted on 16th August 2022.

The html version is in the comments.

Thanks for playing.

-Black Light Studios
